messages.subject: Re: FW: Chicago Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Dr Phil wanted to do a show on homeschooling and gave the impression he wanted to do a positive show, after many days of taping, it boiled down to just 1
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Rue Kream" <skreams@...>
wrote:
>
> --------------------------------
> Subject line: Reporter looking for Chicago unschoolers
>
>Jan and all others
Dr Phil wanted to do a show on homeschooling and gave the impression
he wanted to do a positive show, after many days of taping, it boiled
down to just 1 hour, and it was all negative. Just a caveat, Think
long and seriously before you commit. Blessings Karen Conrad

messages.subject: FW: Chicago Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Subject line: Reporter looking for Chicago unschoolers A Chicago Sun-Times reporter talked with me at length yesterday for an article she is preparing on
messages.messageBody:
--------------------------------
Subject line: Reporter looking for Chicago unschoolers

A Chicago Sun-Times reporter talked with me at length yesterday for an
article she is preparing on unschooling. She would like to interview local
Chicago unschooling families, preferably those with older children.

Here is her contact information:

Rosalind Rossi
Education Reporter
Chicago Sun-Times
Phone 312-321-2553 (direct) or 2522 (City Desk)
Email rrossi@...

She seemed a little surprised by some of the concepts I presented but open
to them. I think the article will be a positive one.

I don't know what her deadline is, so contacts should probably be made soon.

Thanks,

Jan Hunt
Natural Child Project
www.naturalchild.org
----------------------------------------------



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
